original: Erlandsson, Paul, läroverksadjunkt, Norrköping, f. 16/8/83 i Vadstena av Jöns E. o. Adèle Johansson. G. 13 m. Edith Pettersson. Barn: Erland f. 20, fil. mag. — Mog:ex. i Linköp. 02, fil. kand. i Upps. 07, provår i Lund 10-11. E. lär. i Linköp. 08-10 o. 11-12, lär. v. Ljungstedtska tekn. yrkes-sk. där samma tider, adj. i Mariestad 11, adj. i matem. o, fysik v. Norrköp. h. a. 1. sed. 15. Skolöverstyr. ombud v. realex. i Valdemarsvik 24, 25, 27 o. 28. RVO.
translated: Erlandsson, Paul, high school teacher, Norrköping, b. August 16th, 1883 in Vadstena to Jöns E. and Adèle Johansson. Married to Edith Pettersson in 1913. Children: Erland, born in 1920, holds a degree in philosophy. Mog has completed exams in Linköping in 1902, a bachelor's degree in Uppsala in 1907, and a probationary period in Lund from 1910-1911. Paul was a teacher in Linköping from 1908-1910 and 1911-1912, a teacher at Ljungstedtska technical vocational school during those same periods, and a deputy in Mariestad in 1911. He has been a teacher in mathematics and physics at Norrköping högre allmänna läroverk since 1915. He was a school board representative at Valdemarsvik realexamen in 1924, 1925, 1927 and 1928. He was awarded the Royal Order of Vasa.
